title: Bali, Indonesia
description: A tropical paradise known for its beaches, temples, and vibrant culture.

title: Santorini, Greece
description: Famous for its whitewashed buildings, blue domes, and stunning sunsets.

title: Kyoto, Japan
description: A city of traditional tea houses, cherry blossoms, and historic temples.

title: Paris, France
description: The City of Light, known for the Eiffel Tower, art, and romance.

title: New York City, USA
description: A bustling metropolis with iconic landmarks like the Statue of Liberty and Central Park.
